description: Leading frontend development for a modern web application. Architecting scalable React components, implementing design systems, and mentoring junior developers.
Developed and maintained multiple client-facing applications. Improved performance by 40% through code optimization and lazy loading. Collaborated with designers to create pixel-perfect UIs.
Built responsive websites for various clients. Worked with WordPress, custom themes, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Gained experience in full project lifecycle from design to deployment.
